context: Can you give me some movies that Bob Peck starred in?
Absolutely! Bob Peck starred on Jurassic Park, Surviving Picasso and Lord of the Flies, which is also a novel. Is there a particular genre you are interested in?
I love Jurassic Park . Who else is in that movie , Samuel L. Jackson right?
He sure was! He's also been in Inglourious Bastards, Django Unchained and Goodfellas. Have you seen any of those?
Yes, all of them actually. I think I'm going to watch Goodfellas though, I want to see Robert De Niro
resp: Goodfellas is great! If you feel like watching Robert De Niro, I recommend The Godfather, he's great in it.
